text: The Douglas B-66 Destroyer is an American strategic bomber. It was used by the US Air Force during the Cold War and the Vietnam War. It could carry a nuclear weapon. It is a variant of the A-3 Skywarrior. It was used between 1956 and 1975. Some variants were built as reconnaissance aircraft or electronic warfare, as RB-66 and EB-66. About 145 of the 294 total built were the RB-66B reconnaissance version. EB-66s were prominent in the skies over Vietnam during the Vietnam War, using electronic warfare to jam enemy air defense radars and missiles. == References == Category:United States Air Force aircraft B-66 Category:Vietnam War aircraft
title: Douglas B-66 Destroyer
